verses.roman:
jaya jaya gauracandra śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya
jaya jaya nityānanda jayādvaita dhanya

synonyms: jaya jaya—all glories; gauracandra—to Gauracandra; śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; jaya jaya—all glories; nityānanda—to Nityānanda Prabhu; jaya—all glories; advaita—to Advaita Ācārya; dhanya—exalted.
translation: All glories to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, known as Gauracandra! All glories to Lord Nityānanda Prabhu! All glories to Advaita Ācārya, who is so exalted!
